name: Astrolabe Prototype
description:
Built in Unity 

Only works for Android

Controls:

- Use your phone's gyroscope to look around.

- Tap the button at the bottom to go through a list of constellations to possibly find

WARNING: With certain phones, the gyroscope can get janky, the solution is to currently restart the application.
